attacks.name: Tri Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Peck Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If 1 of them is heads, this attack does 20 damage. If both are heads, this attack does 50 damage. If both are tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
